item.title: 默茨告诉欧盟领导人警惕债务危机日益加剧的危险
item.description: 德国总理弗里德里希-默茨（Friedrich Merz）警告欧盟领导人，各国政府和公司不断增加的债务正在加剧新一轮金融危机的风险。【原文：German Chancellor Friedrich Merz warned European Union leaders that the mounting debts of governments and companies are fueling the risk of a new financial crisis.】

item.title: 印度稀土部表示正采取措施缓解稀土限制
item.description: 印度财政部表示，在全球贸易摩擦日益加剧的情况下，印度正在加紧努力确保关键矿产的供应。【原文：India is intensifying efforts to secure critical mineral supplies amid growing global trade frictions, the Finance Ministry said.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴面向用户推出最新图像人工智能服务
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司（Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.）发布了其人工智能技术的新版本，该技术将使用户更容易从文本和视觉图像中生成和修改图像，作为中国电子商务巨头，阿里巴巴将继续积极推动人工智能的发展。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. unveiled a new iteration of its artificial-intelligence technology that will make it easier for users to generate and modify images from texts and visuals, as the Chinese e-commerce giant continues its aggressive push into AI.】

item.title: 泛欧交易所寻求国防公司 IPO，以利用军事热潮
item.description: 欧洲证券交易所运营商泛欧交易所（Euronext NV）正努力争取国防公司上市和热切的投资者，以利用军费开支激增的机会。【原文：European stock exchange operator Euronext NV is seeking to court defense company listings and eager investors to tap the surge in military spending.】

item.title: 通胀预期改善，美国消费者信心指数攀升
item.description: 由于对经济前景和个人财务状况的担忧有所缓解，6 月份美国消费者情绪大幅上升，达到四个月来的最高点，通胀预期明显改善。【原文：US consumer sentiment rose sharply in June to a four-month high and inflation expectations improved notably as concerns eased about the economic outlook and personal finances.】

item.title: 受美联储减息押注和关税乐观情绪影响，美国 500 指数创历史新高
item.description: 由于中美贸易紧张局势降温以及数据刺激了对美联储放松政策的押注，美国股市连续第二天上涨，并创下盘中纪录。【原文：US stocks rose a second straight day and notched an intraday record as trade tensions between the US and China cooled and data stoked bets for Federal Reserve policy easing.】

item.title: 东非国家广泛镇压政治异议人士
item.description: 本周，成千上万的肯尼亚年轻人聚集在全国各地，纪念他们中数十人在抗议活动中丧生一周年。【原文：When thousands of young Kenyans converged across the nation this week to mark a year since scores of them were killed in protests, police were ready and opened fire, leaving at least 16 dead.】

item.title: 受机票价格推动，冰岛通胀再次加速
item.description: 冰岛的通货膨胀率在三个月内连续第二个月意外回升，抑制了人们对这个大西洋国家央行进一步放宽政策的预期。【原文：Iceland’s inflation unexpectedly picked up for the second month in three, damping expectations for further easing by the Atlantic nation’s central bank.】

item.title: 特朗普的 "世界自由基金会 "又多了一个国际加密货币合作伙伴
item.description: 世界自由金融公司（World Liberty Financial Inc.）正在与 Re7 Capital 的一个分支机构建立合作关系，后者是一家总部位于伦敦的分散金融对冲基金，将从香港家族办公室 VMS 集团获得高达 1,000 万美元的投资。【原文：World Liberty Financial Inc. is entering into a partnership with an arm of Re7 Capital, a decentralized-finance hedge fund based in London that is set to receive up to $10 million in investment from Hong Kong family office VMS Group.】

item.title: 英国预算逆转威胁里夫斯及其财政规则
item.description: 工党在重大政策计划上的高昂让步不仅让财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）陷入了如何找到资金来满足预算规定的两难境地。这也开始让人怀疑她自己的职业保障。【原文：Labour’s costly climbdowns on big policy plans don’t just leave Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves with the dilemma of how to find the money to meet her budget rules. They’re also starting to raise questions about her own job security.】

item.title: 路透社称申银万国将秘密申请在香港上市
item.description: 据路透社报道，申银万国集团有限公司正计划在未来几天内秘密提交在香港首次公开募股的招股说明书草案，这将是该公司寻求首次公开募股的第三个地点。【原文：Shein Group Ltd. is planning to confidentially file a draft prospectus for an initial public offering in Hong Kong in the coming days, Reuters reported, which would mark the third venue the company has sought to debut in.】

item.title: 银行争夺 Advent 计划中的 20 亿英镑 Reckitt 单位债务交易
item.description: 在低迷的并购环境中，银行家们争相参与债务融资，支持 Advent International 可能收购利洁时集团（Reckitt Benckiser Group Plc）旗下的一系列家庭护理品牌。【原文：Bankers are vying to play a part in the debt financing backing Advent International’s potential acquisition of a suite of Reckitt Benckiser Group Plc’s homecare brands — a rare leveraged buyout amid a subdued M&A environment.】

item.title: 贸易逆差缩小，印度经常账户出现盈余
item.description: 由于黄金进口数据修正后贸易逆差收窄，印度 1-3 月份的经常账户盈余好于预期。【原文：India’s current account returned a better than expected surplus in the January-March quarter as trade deficit narrowed following the revision of gold import data.】

item.title: 丹麦追回与对冲基金创始人沙阿有关的 2.32 亿欧元
item.description: 在对冲基金创始人桑杰-沙阿（Sanjay Shah）进行刑事调查期间，丹麦正在追回在德国扣押的 2.32 亿欧元（2.72 亿美元），试图挽回因 Cum-Ex 税收丑闻而损失的数十亿美元。【原文：Denmark is clawing back €232 million ($272 million) seized in Germany during a criminal probe of hedge fund founder Sanjay Shah as it tries to recover billions lost to the sprawling Cum-Ex tax scandal.】

item.title: 法国干邑制造商因据报达成结束中国争端的协议而上涨
item.description: 据路透社报道，保乐力加公司（Pernod Ricard SA）和人头马君度公司（Remy Cointreau SA）与中国政府就结束长达数月的贸易争端达成了临时协议，随后这两家干邑生产商的股价上涨。【原文：Shares of Pernod Ricard SA and Remy Cointreau SA rose after Reuters reported the cognac makers had agreed a tentative deal with the Chinese government to end a months-long trade spat.】

item.title: 摩根大通股价本周创下新高，但贝尔德分析师认为是时候卖出了
item.description: 摩根大通公司的股价已从 4 月份的低点攀升了 40% 以上，并在本周创下了历史新高。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. shares have climbed more than 40% from an April low and set record highs this week on a grab bag of positive developments, but to Baird analysts that’s too far, too fast.】

item.title: 美国消费者支出自年初以来首次下降
item.description: 美国 5 月份消费者支出的降幅是今年年初以来最大的，这表明特朗普政府经济政策的不确定性正在日益拖累经济增长前景。【原文：US consumer spending declined in May by the most since the start of the year, indicating elevated uncertainty around the Trump administration’s economic policies is increasingly weighing on the outlook for growth.】

item.title: 加拿大第二季度经济将出现萎缩
item.description: 加拿大经济本季度有望出现小幅下滑，但下滑速度并不像一些经济学家担心的那样快。【原文：The Canadian economy is on track for a modest decline this quarter, yet isn’t deteriorating as fast as some economists feared.】

item.title: 摩根大通认为前沿市场将随着风险消退而进一步反弹
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Frontier-market bonds should deliver robust returns over the coming quarter, benefiting from receding geopolitical risks, dollar weakness and elevated gold prices, according to strategists at JPMorgan Chase & Co.】

item.title: 贝森特称特朗普的贸易努力可能在美国劳动节前结束
item.description: 财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，特朗普政府的贸易协议议程可能会在劳动节假期前结束，这表明一些谈判很可能会延续到即将到来的 7 月互惠关税提高截止日期之后。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said the Trump administration’s agenda for trade agreements could get wrapped up by the Labor Day holiday, indicating some negotiations are likely to extend past the upcoming July deadline for elevated reciprocal tariffs.】

item.title: 美国就业增长乏力的警示信号
item.description: 我是驻哥伦布的美国经济记者马克-尼奎特。今天我们关注美国劳动力市场。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册接收本新闻通讯，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Mark Niquette, a US economy reporter in Columbus. Today we’re looking at the US labor market. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 美联储卡什卡利认为今年将有两次降息，关税前景不明
item.description: 明尼阿波利斯联邦储备银行行长尼尔-卡什卡利（Neel Kashkari）表示，他认为今年可能会有两次降息，第一次可能在9月份，但他警告说，关税可能会对通胀产生延迟影响，决策者应保持灵活。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Minneapolis President Neel Kashkari said he sees two interest-rate cuts as likely this year — with the first potentially in September — but warned that tariffs could have a delayed impact on inflation and policymakers should remain flexible.】

item.title: 投资者急于抛售卡纳科尔债券，加剧了新兴市场最严重的衰退
item.description: 由于卡纳科尔能源有限公司（Canacol Energy Ltd.）竭力提高产量和重建枯竭的储量，投资者对该公司失去了信心，从而引发了今年新兴市场公司债券的最大幅度下跌。【原文：Investors are losing faith in Canacol Energy Ltd. as the gas producer struggles to boost output and rebuild its depleted reserves — sparking the steepest rout in emerging-market corporate debt this year.】

item.title: 中国央行称经济发展势头良好但挑战依然存在
item.description: 中国央行表示，中国经济正呈现积极迹象，信心正在建立，但内需不足和通货紧缩压力等挑战依然存在。【原文：China’s economy is showing positive signs and confidence is building, but challenges such as insufficient domestic demand and deflationary pressure persist, according to the country’s central bank.】

item.title: 加密货币在区块链上重建股市的大胆尝试
item.description: 首先，他们是冲着货币市场来的。然后是货币市场。现在，加密货币的大破坏者正瞄准全球资本主义价值数万亿美元的核心：股票市场。【原文：First, they came for the currency market. Then, the money market. Now, crypto’s big disruptors are targeting the multi-trillion-dollar heart of global capitalism: the stock market.】

item.title: 美国推动在刚果-卢旺达和平协议中加入经济协定
item.description: 直接了解会谈情况的人士说，由美国斡旋达成的刚果民主共和国与卢旺达之间的和平协议将包括两国之间单独的经济一体化协定的纲要；该协定将在三个月内达成。【原文：A US-brokered peace deal between Democratic Republic of Congo and Rwanda will include the outlines of a separate economic integration pact between the two nations — to be concluded within three months, people with direct knowledge of the talks said.】

item.title: 普华永道的人工智能主管称，由于技术节省了员工时间，公司已经降低了价格
item.description: 全球最大的专业咨询公司之一普华永道会计师事务所（PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP）下调了部分服务的价格，原因是客户提出该咨询公司正在使用人工智能来更快地完成工作。【原文：PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP, one of the world’s largest professional advisory firms, has cut prices for some services as clients raised the fact that the consultancy is using artificial intelligence to complete its work quicker.】

item.title: 土耳其计划不提高最低工资标准以吸引投资者
item.description: 据知情人士透露，土耳其政府计划不在年中上调最低工资，以抵制政治压力，缓解不断上涨的生活成本。【原文：Turkey’s government plans to skip a mid-year increase in the minimum wage, according to people with knowledge of the matter, resisting political pressure to alleviate rising living costs.】

item.title: 投入巨资后，中国电网已做好迎接高温的准备
item.description:
这是该国能源转型的关键之夏，但其电力基础设施看起来能够胜任这项任务。【原文：

It’s a crucial summer for the country’s energy transition, but its power infrastructure looks up to the task.

】

item.title: 非洲最大的独立电池投入商业运营
item.description: 电力生产商 Globeleq 表示，其耗资 3 亿美元的南非红沙项目已进入商业运营阶段，该项目将成为非洲大陆最大的独立电池储能系统。【原文：Power producer Globeleq said its $300-million Red Sands project in South Africa, that will be the biggest standalone battery energy storage system on the continent, has reached commercial close.】
